author: Ma128-bit
body:
PR description:

This plugin is required for the central MC production of   4. Since the  decay is not implemented in Pythia, an external generator must be used.
This PR introduces a custom plugin that forces a particle (used here for the ) to decay using kinematic information read from an external ROOT file. The decay is generated in the particles center-of-mass frame by an external event generator (in this case, Pluto).

PR validation:

I successfully compiled the code in CMSSW_16_1_X_2026-02-15-2300 without any issues and privately produced a small MC sample for validation.
title: Add custom plugin to force particle decays using products defined in an external file
